rules_text:
Flying
{1}{U}, Discard Krothuss: Search your library for a Kraken, Leviathan, Octopus, or Serpent card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Whenever a Kraken, Leviathan, Octopus, or Serpent you control deals combat damage to a player, you may return Krothuss from your graveyard to the battlefield.
